Nursing dress in soft viscose jersey with flounces. V-neck, wrapover top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access, 3/4-length, flounced sleeves and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved nursing dress in a fine knit with a wrapover bodice and seam at the waist. Double layer at the top for easier nursing access.
A-line coat in faux fur with a rounded collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and concealed pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Short, fitted lace dress with long, transparent sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Contrasting colour lining front and back.
Microfibre nightslip with side panels in transparent mesh, triangular lace cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lace trims under the bust and at the hem.

Underwired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Decorative straps at the hem, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Waspie in lace and mesh with support panels at the front and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Soft, non-wired bra in satin and lace with triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Brazilian briefs in mesh and satin with lace details. Mid waist, a lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Top in soft pile with a motif on the front, lined hood with ears and a wrapover front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bib-front blouse in an airy modal weave with a sheen. Small, frilled collar, a lace-trimmed V-shaped opening with ties at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-shaped opening and embroidery at the top. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
